page.title: 15Oakley Youth Club
page.content: Oakley Youth Club is held in the village hall from 7 p.m. to 9 p.m. every Wednesday night. It is run by Mrs. S. Graves and Mrs. L. Scott. The age limit is 9 - 15 years. The facilities include two snooker tables, one table tennis table and one football table. In the summer games such as rounders and cricket are played outside. There is also a coffee bar where drinks and sweets can be purchasd. Some nights a film is shown. About thirty people regularly attend the youth club and membership is 5Op and admission each week is 35p or 25p for members. There are trips to nearby places of interest and amateur theatrical groups perform occasionally. There is an annual trip to the fun park at Alton Towers.
